lines.text: Tim!? How the hell did you get here??
The last thing I remember was I got cornered by that… Machine. I tried fighting back, but I wasn’t strong enough.
Hold on... You did it, didn’t you? You defeated the 5 Trials! Seems like you took care of whatever that “robot” thing was too.
Ha ha ha ha, as much as I hate how I pulled you into my mess, I’m grateful you came after us.
The others and I woke up from these containers a moment ago. We seem to be fine, though we are a bit… Shaken.
But wow, isn’t this amazing though? Finding that machine and this hidden room is a huge breakthrough! This could be the discovery of the century!
Although… I suppose I’ve caused enough trouble. Now’s not the time for questions.
Come on, let’s get out of here.
